text: Vertical () is a 1967 Soviet sports drama movie. It was directed by Stanislav Govorukhin and Boris Durov.ВЕРТИКАЛЬ (1966)Вертикаль It stars Vladimir Vysotsky, Gennady Voropayev, and Larisa Luzhina. ==Actors== *Vladimir Vysotsky - Volodya *Gennady Voropayev - Gennady *Larisa Luzhina - Larissa *Georgiy Kulbush - Lomov *Margarita Kosheleva - Rita *Alexander Fadeev - Sasha Nikitin *Bukhuti Zakariadze - Vissarion == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1967 drama movies Category:1960s sports movies Category:Soviet sports movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Sports drama movies
title: Vertical (1967 movie)
